name: D3LTA Prototype
description:
D3LTA is a 2D platformer inspired by Oddworld: Abe's Oddysee and Oddworld: Abe's Exoddus, in which you take control of the titular worker robot "D3LTA" as they attempt to escape the factory they once humbly called their workplace.

This is a prototype that was made as a university project. I plan on further developing and polishing it and hopefully one day release it as a full game, so feedback on this demo is greatly appreciated!

Average Playtime - 5 mins

Played with: Keyboard or Controller (Recommended)
